name: Game no Kanzume: Sega Games Can Vol. 2
overview: Game no Kanzume Vol. 2 (ゲームのかんづめ ＶＯＬ.２) is a compilation of Sega Meganet games, released exclusively in Japan for the Sega Mega-CD. It was released alongside a Vol.1 and was followed by Game no Kanzume Otokuyou. This compilation was partially translated by M.I.J.E.T. in that only the Phantasy Star II Text Adventures and Fatal Labyrinth were translated. Games Included 16t Aworg: Hero in the Sky Fatal Labyrinth Ikasuze! Koi no Doki Doki Penguin Land MD Medal City Phantasy Star II: Anne's Adventure Phantasy Star II: Kinds's Adventure Phantasy Star II: Nei's Adventure Phantasy Star II: Rudger's Adventure Putter Golf Robot Battler Teddy Boy Blues
